alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 16 at 11:51AM EST until February 18 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Cuyahoga River At Independence affecting Cuyahoga County. Cuyahoga River At Old Portage affecting Summit County. Killbuck Creek Near Killbuck affecting Holmes and Wayne Counties. Mahoning River At Warren affecting Trumbull County. Mahoning River At Leavittsburg affecting Trumbull County. Mahoning River At Youngstown affecting Mahoning and Trumbull Counties. For the Cuyahoga River...including Old Portage, Independence...Major flooding is forecast. For the Killbuck Creek...including Killbuck...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Cuyahoga River At Independence. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Property along Canal, Frances, Murray, Rockside, and Cloverleaf Roads in the village of Valley View inundated. Water extends to Commerce Parkway, Wall Street, Exchange Road, and Cloverleaf Parkway. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 4.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 21.5 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.6 feet on 03/29/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 945 PM EST.
